actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to extend the terms of members of the National Park System Advisory Board, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends the terms of the members of the National Park System Advisory Board by two years. (Currently, such Board members are appointed for a term not to exceed four years.)

titles.title: A bill to extend the terms of members of the National Park System Advisory Board, and for other purposes.
